scripts.setup: npm ci; python3.9 -m venv xb-env; npm run deps
scripts.clean-setup: rm -rf node_modules xb-env; npm run setup
scripts.deps: source xb-env/bin/activate; pip install -r requirements.txt --upgrade; pip install -r requirements.dev.txt --upgrade
scripts.deploy: gcloud app deploy --project xbattle-io --version `git describe --always --abbrev=7 --match 'NOT A TAG' --dirty='-tainted'` --no-promote app.yaml cron.yaml
